entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Local smoke. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 24. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing before morning. Local smoke. Low 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
